name: Draco & The Seven Sea Scales
description:
Discover the mysteries of the great ocean in Draco & The Seven Sea Scales!

Enjoy pixely goodness in a retro inspired top down dungeon crawler, where you get to play as a boat on the open water!

This demo includes the first dungeon in the game, filled with

- dangerous foes

- a rambunctious crew

- ominous boss fights

For more updates as the game is worked on, follow me here! @Xythas

Art: @Anima_nel
Music: @tohomoko

Game supports keyboard and xbox controller. Windows only for now!

Find any bugs? Report them here!
